title: What is the comparison of the iPhone 11 and the iPhone 12 Pro Max? - Quora

response.answer_text: iPhone 12 pro max hasn’t launched yet, but there are a few things we can expect.  Display - iPhone 12 pro max might have a 120hz AMOLED display with more than 500 ppi, but iphone 11 has a 60hz LCD panel with 326 ppi Cameras - iPhone 12 pro max will have one extra lens when compared to iPhone 11 and that is telephoto lens and all of the sensors might be improved Battery life - we have to wait and see, but i think there will be significant improvements because of the 5nm technology on iPhone 12 pro max Processor - iPhone 12 pro max will have the a14 bionic chipset which will be based on 5nm process, it will be more efficient than the a13 bionic Design - we might get the legendary iPhone 5s design with flat sides and chamfered edges

Since the iPhone 12 hasn’t been announced it doesn’t currently exist. You can’t compare the iPhone 11 with something which doesn’t exist! Ask this question again in the Fall when the new iPhones are expected to be released and we know what they look like, what features they have, and what they cost.

As APPLE is expected to officially launch the iPhone 12 series in the Autumn of 2020, whatever one has read and/or talked about the iPhone 12 at this time will be only speculations. Hence one cannot, at this time, do a proper comparison between iPhone 11 and the iPhone 12 series. Let us wait till the Autumn of 2020.

Nothing for sure, iPhone 12 Pro Max hasn’t come out yet. It is said to have 5G Signal Baseband, A14 chip, 120Hz refresh rate, smaller nor no notch. https://blog.cinoparts.com/the-disclose-of-the-iphone-12-seriers/
